mapper.sql: id, report_id, report_version, created_at, reply_ids, message
mapper.select: SELECT max( report_version ) max_version FROM t_version WHERE report_id = #{reportId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_version (id, report_id, report_version, created_at, reply_ids, message, report_content) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{reportVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{replyIds,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
